FuncDef: The reset access statistics trigger slot command deletes access packet statistics on a board.

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes access packet statistics on the board in a specified slot.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the access trigger packet-limit command is run to configure a limit on the number of ARP/IP/IPv6/ND packets that can be sent to the main control board, you can run the reset access statistics trigger command to delete access packet statistics.
Prerequisites
The access trigger packet-limit command has been run.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
